This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Pizza Table Total 3 Product(s) We are professional pizza table factory and supplier in China.We can produce pizza table according to your requirements.More types of pizza table wanted,please contact us right now! View:
Blast Pizza Counter PZ18L2W This model of blast pizza case is equipped with R404a refrigerant which enable quick refrigeration effect and keep the pizza fresh. It is quite suitable for Pizza storage in a good condition.It is widely used in commercial kitchen like restaurant , hotel and buffet supplies.
Blast Pizza Table PZ12L1W We introduce both mobile and stationary Blast Pizza Table, which are customized as per the requirement of the clients. Having the quality of being environmental friendly and elegant in designs, they are able keep the food for a longer duration. We have a special user friendly design counter.
Upside Pizza Case VRX1200 We are very well known for offering very high quality Upside Pizza Case. Single station operational device for multiple misen-palace activity.Refrigerated bottom storage facility, work top availability and stacking convenience accelerates work speed and reduces space requirement. Custom built product engineered to your size and specification.
